nodes.title: Final Prompt
widgets_values:
Here are the 10 AI painting scene descriptions based on your prompts:

**Scene 1**
"Countdown to New Year: A beautiful woman holds a sparkler, surrounded by fireworks exploding in the night sky, with glittering confetti falling around her."

**Scene 2**
"A stunning lady stands in front of a majestic fireworks display, her long hair blown back by the wind as she gazes up at the colorful explosions."

**Scene 3**
"In the heart of the city, a lovely woman waves a sparkler in celebration of the New Year, as fireworks burst above her and people cheer in the background."

**Scene 4**
"A serene winter evening scene features a young woman standing on a frozen lake, gazing up at a magnificent fireworks display reflected in the still water."

**Scene 5**
"On a chilly December night, a chic woman wraps herself in a warm coat, her eyes shining bright as she watches the mesmerizing fireworks show unfold above her."

**Scene 6**
"In a bustling street festival, a vibrant woman dances with excitement, her hands waving sparklers as fireworks light up the night sky behind her."

**Scene 7**
"A quiet moment of contemplation before midnight: a lovely woman sits on a hillside, holding a single candle flame amidst the twinkling stars, as the fireworks explode in the distance."

**Scene 8**
"A lively party atmosphere is captured in this scene, where a stunning woman stands at the center, surrounded by friends cheering and waving glow sticks as the fireworks boom above them."

**Scene 9**
"In the midst of a snowy landscape, a brave woman ventures out to watch the New Year's Eve fireworks, her face aglow with wonder as the sparkling bursts light up the dark sky."

**Scene 10**
"As the clock strikes midnight, a radiant woman stands atop a hill, bathed in the golden glow of fireworks illuminating the starry night sky, her arms raised in joyous celebration."

English:
[insert each description]
Chinese:
[insert each description]

Please let me know if you need any further modifications or adjustments!
You are an assistant who perfectly describes images.

nodes.title: LLM System Prompt
widgets_values: 请给出关于下面主题的2个ai绘画场景，需要给出每个场景的ai绘画描述词，按照一下顺序对提示词进行整理： 主题/美女描述/面部表情，动作，服饰，细节，背景和环境，光照，氛围，需要把上面这些内容组合在一个提示词段落里可以直接拿来用，不需要加入具体的分类，直接整合在一起自然一点。 给出英文回答，一个场景一个段落，不要添加任何额外的内容
主题： 元旦到了，美女和烟花，手持烟火棒，背景里包含烟花,夜晚的场景

请给出关于下面主题的2个ai绘画场景，需要给出每个场景的ai绘画描述词，按照以下顺序对提示词进行整理： 主题/美女描述/面部表情，动作，服饰，细节，背景和环境，光照，氛围，需要把上面这些内容组合在一个提示词段落里可以直接拿来用，不需要加入具体的分类，直接整合在一起自然一点。 给出英文回答，一个场景一个段落，不要添加任何额外的内容

主题： 元旦到了，美女和烟花，手持烟火棒，背景里包含烟花,夜晚的场景，衣着下半身以短裙/短裤为主，突出女孩的美好身材，穿着要有特色时尚，city fashion style cloth, 背景优美，让人难忘



请给出关于下面主题的40个ai绘画场景，需要给出每个场景的ai绘画描述词，按照以下顺序对提示词进行整理： 主题/美女描述/面部表情，动作，服饰，细节，背景和环境，光照，氛围，需要把上面这些内容组合在一个提示词段落里可以直接拿来用，不需要加入具体的分类，直接整合在一起自然一点。 给出英文回答，一个场景一个段落，不要添加任何额外的内容

主题： 最新的模特时尚穿搭，穿搭需要来自于主流的时尚表演或者杂志，背景以城市或者室内为主，要有各种动作体现女孩美好的身材和优雅, 包括仰视和俯视场景，衣服的领口不要太低，最多半低就好
